channel.title: How do you
channel.description: Create a command that sends a selected player or character to a location?

item.title: How do you
item.dc:creator: @Picoscape Picoscape
item.description:
@Picoscape wrote:

This is nice, thanks, any way that there can be a preset location to send them.

Like send player to varrock
so the x and y coordinates are not defined by what is typed in-game, but just ::varrock playername
sends someone to varrock?

Thanks!

Read full topic

item.title: How do you
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

if(command.startsWith("sendplayer"))
{
      //Puts each parameter in a String (command, name, x, y)
      String theParams[] = command.split(" ");

      //Gets instance of client class for targeted player
      //PlayerHandler.getPlayerID() returns the player's id by supplying the player's name
      client thePlayer = (client)server.playerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(theParams[1])];

      //Sends player to new coordinates
      thePlayer.teleportToX = theParams[2]; //The x coordinate we stored from String.split()
      thePlayer.teleportToY = theParams[3]; //The y coordinate we stored from String.spilt()
}

There you go. Explained it for you in the comments.
I also you suggest reading THIS.

Read full topic
